get.summary: Gets the current assignment for the given user role on a project
get.description:
By passing in the company, project id, action item id and action item details, you can update action item status to pending review.

The following roles are avaliable:
  - primarycoalfirecontact: Coalfire Project Manager
  - projectlead: Coalfire Project Lead
  - coalfiredirector: Coalfire Project Director
  - primarycustomercontact: Customer Project Lead

put.summary: Updates the current assignment for the given user role on a project
put.description:
By passing in the company id, the project id and the type of project role, you can assign members to roles.
  
  
The following roles are avaliable:
  - primarycoalfirecontact: Coalfire Project Manager
  - projectlead: Coalfire Project Lead
  - coalfiredirector: Coalfire Project Director
  - primarycustomercontact: Customer Project Lead

delete.summary: Unassign the given user from the role on a project
delete.description:
By passing in the company id, the project id and the type of project role, you can remove an assignment of a member to a role.
  
  
The following roles are avaliable:
  - primarycoalfirecontact: Coalfire Project Manager
  - projectlead: Coalfire Project Lead
  - coalfiredirector: Coalfire Project Director
  - primarycustomercontact: Customer Project Lead

ApiUserToken.description: User API Token generated from CoalfireOne User Profile

Message.example: Authorization has been denied for this request.

RecurrenceExpression.example: FREQ=WEEKLY;INTERVAL=1;BYDAY=SU,MO,TU,WE,TH,FR,SA or FREQ=DAILY;INTERVAL=1 or FREQ=MONTHLY;INTERVAL=1;BYMONTHDAY=1 or FREQ=MONTHLY;BYDAY=+1SU;INTERVAL=1 or FREQ=YEARLY;BYMONTHDAY=1;BYMONTH=1 or FREQ=YEARLY;BYDAY=+1SU;BYMONTH=1 (Note: this is an iCal expressions. Repeat Until and Count are not supported at this time. Only examples formats mentioned are supported, BYDAY only supports values from -1 to +4 being -1: LAST)

A service was found to be running on the system.
